# mihai.codes

> Personal portfolio and blog of Mihai Chindris - Cloud Engineer & Full-Stack Developer. Built with Qwik, Tailwind CSS, and Cloudflare Pages.
> Last updated: 2026-01-14

## Contact
- Email: hello@mihai.codes
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mihai-chindris
- GitHub: https://github.com/chindris-mihai-alexandru

## Pages

### Home
URL: https://mihai.codes
Portfolio showcasing professional experience, technical projects, certifications, and blog. Features dark/light theme with instant loading via Qwik's resumability.

### Blog
URL: https://mihai.codes/blog
Technical articles on cloud engineering, AWS, DevOps, and building in public. All posts managed via Sanity CMS with full markdown support.

### AWS Bedrock + Anthropic Claude: The Complete Troubleshooting Guide
URL: https://mihai.codes/blog/aws-bedrock-anthropic-troubleshooting
Three undocumented gotchas that will save you hours of debugging when setting up Claude models on AWS Bedrock. | Tags: aws, bedrock, anthropic, cloud

### Building AI Agents with OpenCode and Free LLMs
URL: https://mihai.codes/blog/building-ai-agents-with-opencode
How to set up an autonomous AI coding agent using OpenCode, OpenRouter, and completely free language models. | Tags: ai, opencode, agents, cloud

### Why I Chose Qwik Over Next.js
URL: https://mihai.codes/blog/why-qwik
A deep dive into resumability, hydration, and why Qwik's approach to JavaScript is revolutionary. | Tags: qwik, javascript, frameworks

## About Mihai Chindris

Mihai is a software professional based in Maramures, Romania with 3+ years at Siemens spanning Application Support, Azure Development, and cloud operations. Currently pursuing an M.S. in Software Engineering at Quantic School of Business & Technology with focus on AI, machine learning, and cloud architectures.

**Location**: Maramures, Romania

### Professional Experience

**Siemens** (3+ years)

- **Application Support Engineer** (2021-2022): Provided technical support for enterprise applications, troubleshooting complex issues and ensuring system reliability.
- **Azure Developer** (2022-2023): Developed and maintained cloud-based solutions on Microsoft Azure, focusing on scalability and performance.
- **Cloud Operations** (2023-Present): Managing cloud infrastructure, implementing DevOps practices, and optimizing cloud resource utilization.

### Education

- **Quantic School of Business & Technology** - M.S. Software Engineering (2024-Present): Focus on AI, machine learning, and cloud architectures.
- **Technical University** - B.S. Computer Science (2018-2021): Foundation in software development and computer systems.

### Technical Skills

AWS, Azure, TypeScript, React, Qwik, Node.js, Python, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD, DevOps, Cloud Architecture, Microservices, API Design, Database Design, Git, Agile

### Certifications

- AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
- Microsoft Azure Developer Associate
- Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)

## Projects

- [mihai.codes](https://mihai.codes): Personal Portfolio & Blog - Portfolio and technical blog built with Qwik, Tailwind CSS, and Sanity CMS. Features instant loading, dark/light theme, and edge deployment on Cloudflare Pages.
- [OpenCode Agent](https://github.com/chindris-mihai-alexandru/opencode-agent): AI Coding Assistant - Autonomous AI agent for code generation and refactoring using OpenCode and free LLMs via OpenRouter.
- [AWS Bedrock Toolkit](https://github.com/chindris-mihai-alexandru/bedrock-toolkit): AWS Bedrock Utilities - Collection of utilities and examples for working with AWS Bedrock and Anthropic Claude models.

## Tech Stack

- **Framework**: Qwik + Qwik City (resumability, zero hydration)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with dark/light theme
- **CMS**: Sanity (headless, GROQ queries)
- **Hosting**: Cloudflare Pages (edge deployment)
- **Language**: TypeScript

## Repository

- Main Site: https://github.com/chindris-mihai-alexandru/mihai.codes
- Sanity Studio: https://github.com/chindris-mihai-alexandru/mihai-codes-studio
- Live Site: https://mihai.codes
- Studio: https://mihai-codes.sanity.studio
- Sanity Project ID: 76ahey7l

## Crawling Rules

Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_astro/
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /private
